name: ABC
description: Welcome to ABC, where imagination powers the world. This first-of-its-kind art collection, created out of pure joy and now forever inscribbled on Bitcoin, will warp you into a community of dreamers and innovators living across chains. ABC will bring back the limitless imagination of your youth, where the CC0 art belongs to you, the community belongs to you, and the possibilities are endless. Dive in and join the fun!
